trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the cat moves at least 10 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the panther can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action. The cat can only pounce when not being ridden.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.
